Title: Raise the Alarm
Description:
So the Druids of the Flame have allied with Fyrakk to help him invade the Emerald Dream.

They were able to turn that keeper to the flame with hardly any effort. Fyrakk must be bolstering their power, perhaps as payment for their aid in accessing the Dream.

We need to mobilize troops immediately to find every Druid of the Flame on the Dragon Isles and stop them.

Go to Captain Drine in Valdrakken and alert her. She will dispatch the drakonid.

I will go to Merithra and handle things here.
ObjectivesText: Deliver your report to Captain Drine at the Seat of the Aspects in Valdrakken.

Objectives.Text: Use the Sentinel's Whistle to return to Valdrakken
Follow guards to the lower ledge
